items.title: Why bank stocks care that Michael Barr is stepping down as top Fed banking cop
items.description: Barr was leading the effort to raise capital requirements for banks.

items.title: Why DraftKings is betting on a subscription service that gives members improved odds
items.description: Paying consumers will have the ability to get better odds on their parlays for a monthly $20 charge

items.title: Is any amount of alcohol safe to drink, in light of surgeon general’s cancer warning?
items.description: Surgeon General Vivek Murthy recommended that labels on alcoholic beverages be updated to include a warning about cancer risk.

items.title: ‘I’m rich beyond my wildest dreams’: I’m 66 and inherited $500,000. How do I make sure this money lasts?
items.description: “Should I buy an investment property? Stocks? CDs?”

items.title: Fed official delivers blunt warning on the stock market, which ignores it
items.description: Federal Reserve Gov. Lisa Cook gave one of the bluntest warnings an official at the central bank has ever delivered about the stock market.
